Package ohos.media.audio

Interface AudioWaver.WaveDataObserver

  • Enclosing class:
    AudioWaver

    public static interface AudioWaver.WaveDataObserver
    Provides an observer to listen for time-domain audio data.

    The observer is required when your application needs to collect the audio data.

    Since:
    4
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Multimedia#AUDIO

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onWaveData​(byte[] data, int sampleRate)
      Called to obtain the time-domain audio data and the sampling rate.

    • Method Detail

      • onWaveData

        void onWaveData​(byte[] data,
                int sampleRate)
        Called to obtain the time-domain audio data and the sampling rate.

        Before calling this method, register the observer via AudioWaver#setWaveDataObserver.

        Parameters:
        data - Indicates the time-domain audio data.
        sampleRate - Indicates the audio sampling rate.
        Since:
        4
